custom_fields.key_topics: Filming, editing, narrative, storytelling, aesthetics, composition, sound effects, visual effects, filming tricks, green screen, photoshop, stop-motion
custom_fields.goals: Students will learn filming clear and steady videos and will gain simple but great editing skills. Students will learn how to use several features of video editing tools. They will be able to convert an idea or a sketched storyline into a creative video.
custom_fields.relevance: Most of us use our phones to take beautiful videos and pictures, but very few know what the right tools are. This class will help guide students in the creation and directing of creative short videos. We will cover natural film transitions, appearance and disappearance of elements, stop-motion, video masks, green screen effects, and creating our own green screen videos on Adobe Photoshop. This class will make you a stronger director of film just using your phone.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Supplementary YouTube and Instagram tutorial videos.

long_desc: Many professional and amateur photographers are using their smartphones to shoot video projects. With the right photography techniques and editing applications, smartphones can be used to produce creative film content. This course introduces students to the world of video editing and creative content creation. Students will learn basic video editing techniques using only their phone. Combined with their imagination, students will be able to produce artistic short videos.
name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Creative Mobile Video Editing
